Note: If you dont agree on this review then dont comment on it, I dont want any negative comments about me or my opinion. Thank you :)
Counter Strike source is a unusual fps shooter that really doesnt capture my intrest when i play. The one thing i hate most about this game is that when you get shot you slow down like a snail and next thing you know your dead or in bad health and u cant spawn untill the next round so that ruins the fun. It also doesnt have any ranking up so I dont really see the point of playing. The custom gamemodes that people made is the exact same thing in gmod only that gmod has different characters to play as rather than css which is only limited to the counter strike player models. This game features: Bad fps action, etc. Im not saying you shouldn't get this game, this is a must buy because of gmod and its textures and its highly recommended that you get this so that you wont have any missing textures.
Cost: $10
Rating: 27/100 It sucks

Der womöglich am meist bekannteste Egoshooter der Welt... Zurecht, denn obwohl er relativ schlicht gehalten ist und die Grafik nicht auf dem neusten Stand ist, ist er extrem anspruchsvoll und hebt sich für mich persönlich, durch die super gelungenen Mehrspielermöglichkeiten, von anderen Egoshootern ab! CounterStrike Source ist einfach eine Klasse für sich und ein "must-have" für alle begeisterten Egoshooter Spieler!

Notice how all of the negative reviews are only a sentence long and half of them are "outdated graphics, looks nothing like muh skyrim" kids. CS:GO will never live up to CS:S. The amount of mods and modded maps in source will never be matched in CS:GO. Not to mention half of the CS:GO community is so enveloped in the disgusting microtransaction model that valve throws in all their new rehashed games. Believe me you will never have as much fun in CS:GO as you can have in CS:S. Now in terms of competitive play, obviously you should go for CS:GO since it's current. Find a good community/group of servers in CS:S and play a mod/gamemode you like and you won't regret it.

Edit: CS:GO is getting a tiny bit better with maps ported from CS:S, but playing them just makes me want to play CS:S to be honest. I've played all the maps on CS:S already, would be better if they made new maps.  Most of my time in CS:GO is spent playing casual or comp matchmaking which is pretty boring after awhile.

Without a doubt, Counter-Strike series remains to be one best FPS ever developed. From 1.6 to Condition Zero, Source brings you enhanced graphics, new interface, 64-player capability and new physics engine for different game modes. This game will give you countless of hours on multiplayer. If you have steam (obviously), seriously get it. CS:S is a must have.

To be honest, this game really surprised me. Yes it's true, the hitboxes are big, the weapons are weak. But the gameplay is something that is unique to Counter-Strike: Source, And that's why this is my favourite Counter-Strike game.

+Fun Gameplay
+Hundreds of servers
+Numbers of gamemodes
+Almost no russians

-Big hitboxes
-People are either very bad or very pro at the game

You're more than likely gonna end up dead a lot of the time, it is neither a game that can be played solo, and outside of organized play, not one that can effectively be played in a team. Nonetheless it has solid mechanics that are simple to understand and visuals, that while not outstanding in this day and age manage to maintain quality and visual appeal.
